title: Business Analyst (BA)
description:
As a Business Analyst, you will work closely with Product, Technology and Operation team. This position is expected to lead a team of 2 - 3 in next 6 - 9 months. 

Description of Job: 

- Quickly understands the business issues and data challenges of the organization and industry.
- To collect business requirements from product team, operation team or end users.
- Reviews and edits requirements, specifications, business processes and recommendations related to proposed solution.
- Develops functional specifications, wireframes and system design specifications.
- Manage and elaborate requirements into user stories and acceptance criteria.
- Integrate usability studies, research, and market analysis into detailed analysis and reports.
- Analyze requirements and draw wireframes with UX experience.
- Create wireframes to effectively communicate interaction and design ideas.
- Develop metrics and reports that can be used to drive data driven decisions.
- Stay tuned with design trends, technologies, and best practices.
requirements:
Bachelor degree in IT or related field.
At least 1 years experience in BA role on internet/consumer products, not B2B.
Experience working in the internet-product company.
Knowledge of software development process, especially software requirement analysis.
Excellent in both Vietnamese & English communications skills (speaking, listening, reading and writing). Must be able to communicate effectively and confidently with users, team members, and management.
Very strong analytical and product management skills required, including a thorough understanding of how to interpret customer business needs and translate them into the application and operational requirements.
Able to produce wireframes and specs related.
Comfortable in a small, intense and high-growth startup environment. 
Flexible schedule but require working with the remote team in the USA in evenings
Personal integrity, able to work to deadlines and under pressure.
